comment: Hard ride rim hits (59) cause cross-talk to tom2 (43) and tom3 (45).
Hard ride rim hits (59) cause minor cross-talk to the kick (36).
Hard crash rim hits (55) cause minor cross-talk to the snare (38).
Hard crash and ride rim hits (55, 59) cause minor cross-talk to regular crash & ride hits (49, 51).
The ride and crash chokes cause certain MIDI notes. In some cases this needs ~10ms delay.
